BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-27 15:27
Subject: Re-introducing our Service Catalog, Transform Tuesdays, LeadForward Recap, Shaping Change Tech&Data, Welcome Jeremy Denisty
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0159807b725453099eb06487f0acb2f4523041797.png> 	

Discover the New & Improved Service Catalog!

Re-introducing our Service Catalog, now live on One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1127&user=10620>   <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1127&user=10620> under the Group Services section. This is your go-to resource to explore all support services — their Scope, SLAs, rate cards, and what to expect.

What’s New?

*	TECH & DATA has been restructured to better align with your needs
*	COEX (Center of Excellence) have been introduced to drive efficiency through LEAN transformation and continuous improvement in our Operations
*	Internal Communications has been added to the service catalog and will be part of this year’s Voice of the Business (VOB)

chunks.text:
*	TECH & DATA has been restructured to better align with your needs
*	COEX (Center of Excellence) have been introduced to drive efficiency through LEAN transformation and continuous improvement in our Operations
*	Internal Communications has been added to the service catalog and will be part of this year’s Voice of the Business (VOB)

Ahead of the upcoming Voice of the Business (VoB) survey, we invite you to take a moment to explore the catalog to better understand the scope and support each service provides.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Transform Tuesdays

Transformation doesn’t happen all at once — it builds, one function at a time. With Transform Chalhoub, we’re not just upgrading systems; we’re changing how we work, connect, and make decisions across the Group.

Finance is leading the way — becoming more connected, proactive, and strategic with end-to-end visibility and real-time data.

Want to know what’s changing first?
Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1128&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1128&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

LeadForward Recap

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1129&user=10620> 	

This week, we’re continuing our LeadForward recap by revisiting the theme of Driving Innovation.

chunks.text:
LeadForward Recap

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1129&user=10620> 	

This week, we’re continuing our LeadForward recap by revisiting the theme of Driving Innovation.

 In this module, we explored how to think disruptively, experiment fearlessly, and use play as a spark for fresh ideas.  

Read this article <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1129&user=10620>  to learn how suspending judgment, embracing spontaneity, and challenging assumptions can open the door to new ways of working and leading. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Shaping Change as Tech&Data Leaders

Tech&Data leaders recently participated in an engaging Change Masterclass led by the MC Change Management team.

Blending neuroscience, practical frameworks, and real-life experience, the session created space for reflection, connection, and meaningful conversation. Leaders explored how to navigate uncertainty and lead change with empathy, clarity, and purpose.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1130&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-2-min.png> 	

Welcome Jeremy Denisty to the Group

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/eb51df869fdeae3a1ed693fe8bddb9091437139205.png> 	

Jeremy joins us as Director – AI, leading the Group’s efforts to accelerate AI adoption and unlock transformative value within and across brands, functions, and geographies.

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/eb51df869fdeae3a1ed693fe8bddb9091437139205.png> 	

Jeremy joins us as Director – AI, leading the Group’s efforts to accelerate AI adoption and unlock transformative value within and across brands, functions, and geographies.

Originally from Belgium, Jeremy brings over a decade of experience in tech, strategy, and digital transformation. He was previously Managing Partner at Imagin3 Studio, advising over 150 companies on AI and emerging tech.

Outside work, Jeremy is a published author, keynote speaker, and former actor who enjoys cars, travel, and family time.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1131&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family. 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/newsletter-open.php?nli=257&user=10620>
